header.title: Installing cosProperty

section.title: Installation Process
section.p: This chapter describes how to install cosProperty in an Erlang Environment.

section.title: Preparation
section.p: Before starting the installation process for cosProperty, the application Orber must be running.

section.title: Configuration
section.p: First the cosProperty application must be installed by using cosProperty:install() and, if requested, cosProperty:install_db(), followed by cosProperty:start(). Now we can start the desired Factory type by using either cosProperty:start_SetFactory() or cosProperty:start_SetDefFactory().
